description.lang: NuTone Smart Home Series Premium Smart Home Series Controller Monitor, turn on/off or schedule anything connected through the hub from anywhere in the world with one, easy-to-use app.Pick 200 of your favorite Wi-Fi, Z-Wave, ZigBee, and Bluetooth devices to connect.Easily control your entire home with one touch settings for Home, Away, Night and Vacation.Works with major brands including nest, Schlage, Yale, NuTone, Kwikset, First Alert, plus many more
